column7: Engineering Internship is for engineering undergraduate students who are completing full-time or part-time internship or co-op that is related to their major field of study and an integral or important part of their program of study. Students participating in research-based projects should contact the Office of Undergraduate Research in Engineering to identify an appropriate course. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms.
column9: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms.
